## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
 -  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Could not craft stone furnaces
- The agent does not have enough stone to craft stone furnaces. Ensure you have enough stone before crafting. Stone is a raw resource that must be gathered first.
